lead_paragraph: The French Tennis Federation (FFT) has provisionally suspended Benoit Paire, Kristina Mladenovic and Caroline Garcia for "damaging" the organization's image by their behavior at this month's Rio Olympics.

headline.print_headline: French Players Suspended Over Behavior at Olympics
headline.main: French Players Suspended Over Behavior at Olympics
